definition: a grant (by a sovereign or a legislative body) of resources to maintain a dependent member of a ruling family
details:
noun
- a grant (by a sovereign or a legislative body) of resources to maintain a dependent member of a ruling family
= example: a grant (by a sovereign or a legislative body) of resources to maintain a dependent member of a ruling family
= synonyms: apanage
- any customary and rightful perquisite appropriate to your station in life
= example: any customary and rightful perquisite appropriate to your station in life
= synonyms: apanage
